author: m.kalinin
content:
After a few months of work <@!353136597522448385> and myself have accomplished the first major milestone in Eth1-Eth2 Merger roadmap.

We have built a prototype that consists of Eth1-engine and Phase1 simulator talking to each other via Eth1-Eth2 communication protocol. With this setup one is able to send any Eth1 transaction in Eth2 environment on a local machine.

Prototype: http://github.com/txrx-research/eth1-shard-demo
